commit.message:
configure.in: Add x86 darwin support for libjava.

	* configure.in: Add x86 darwin support for libjava.
	* configure: Regenerate.

From-SVN: r119678

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,8 @@
+2006-12-08  Sandro Tolaini  <tolaini@libero.it>
+
+	* configure.in: Add x86 darwin support for libjava.
+	* configure: Regenerate.
+
 2006-12-07  Mike Stump  <mrs@apple.com>
 
 	* Makefile.def (dependencies): Add dependency for
